name: To Courier with Love
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Bill Odenkirk, Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: After promising Marge the trip of a lifetime, Homer makes a deal with a travel agent to be a courier of a top-secret briefcase in exchange for a discounted family vacation to Paris.
